content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Processing Facility at Position (-14.5, -48.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) for storing extracted iron ore
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) for smelting iron ore into iron plates
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5) for transferring items between entities

### Coal Processing Facility at Position (41.5, -80.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) for storing extracted coal
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) for smelting processes
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) for transferring items between entities

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that there are sufficient items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a furnace. This will prevent errors related to insufficient inventory items.

### Errors when chests are full
- Regularly check and empty chests to ensure they have space for new items. This will prevent mining drills from stopping due to full chests.

### Errors related to insufficient fuel
- Keep track of fuel levels in mining drills and inserters to prevent them from running out of fuel and halting operations. Regular refueling is essential for continuous operation.
